name: Hobbit Meal Planner
imageAlt: A screenshot of the hobbit meal planner website
description: What about second breakfast? With this app you can build your 7 meal feast using a customizeable meal plan creator.

name: MakeOverflow
imageAlt: A screenshot of the makeoverflow.com website
description: MakeOverflow is a Stack Overflow clone designed specifically for MakeSchool students.
technologies: Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript

name: Doughversity
imageAlt: A screenshot of the doughversity.com website
description: Doughversity was designed as a platform to allow local bakeries to sell their goods online direct to consumers. This app is currently a prototype so no purchases can actually be made. However, all of the necessary functionality is in place so that it otherwise functions. Feel free to create an account and mess around. Check out my write up of the website here: rb.gy/ttlkrz

name: Anonymous Chat
imageAlt: A teal message bubble with the word no inside of it.
description: This was my first node.js backend. This project aims to be a chat app that saves no data and provides a fully anonymous platform for communication.

name: csrichart.com
imageAlt: A screenshot of the csrichart.com website
description: This website is an art portfolio I built using wordpress.

name: HHSEasy Cal
imageAlt: A screenshot of the hhseasycal website
description: A calendar and block schedule app I designed to help students at my highschool to better navigate an over complicated class block schedule.

name: Quarticolor
imageAlt: A red, blue, green, and yellow circle
description: A fast paced shap sorting game create with spritekit and swift 3.

name: Lawn Mower Man Mobile
imageAlt: A man riding a lawn mower
description: Created over winter break from a friends goofy idea, lawn mower man is an idle game where the player mows lawns for money to upgrade their mower. Lawn mower man gained a cult following during it's time on Apple's app store. Unfortunately the app is no longer avaliable.

name: 3d Printing
imageAlt: A 3d printer printing an orange rocket ship
description: This project was created for a middle school technology student association competition on website design and the history of 3d printers
